Creating simple games with Raylib is the easiest way to study C++ programming languages.

# Library
- [Raylib](https://www.raylib.com/index.html)

## Quick start
### Linux
<div class="code-box">
  <pre><code>bash build.bash</code></pre>
  <button onclick="copyCode(this)"></button>
</div>
